title: WATCH LIVE: Agrizzi back on the stand for the 7th day
text:
WATCH LIVE: Agrizzi back on the stand for the 7th day

24 January, 10:05 AM

Former Bosasa chief operations officer Angelo Agrizzi on Wednesday delivered damning testimony on how the company deleted 40 000 documents implicating the company and its executives in corruption from its servers days before investigators from the Special Investigating Unit (SIU) could access them.

The eyewitness, and participant to large-scale corruption at state entities will for the seventh day be on the witness stand at the judicial commission of inquiry into state capture.

LIVE: #StateCaptureInquiry | Read Agrizzi's 'little black book'

Live stream courtesy of SABCnews.com.
description: Former Bosasa COO Angelo Agrizzi will for a seventh day continue delivering testimony about corruption at the company at the commission of inquiry into state capture. Watch live.
